sql: SELECT c.CategoryName, SUM(od.Quantity) AS total_quantity FROM 'Order Details' od JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE strftime('%Y', o.OrderDate) = '1997' AND strftime('%m', o.OrderDate) = '06' GROUP BY c.CategoryName ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 1;

sql: SELECT AVG(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity - (od.Discount * od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity)) AS AverageOrderValue FROM 'Order Details' od JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID WHERE strftime('%Y', o.OrderDate) = '1997' AND strftime('%m', o.OrderDate) >= '01-01' AND strftime('%m', o.OrderDate) <= '12-31';
explanation: Generated by hybrid agent in ≤ 2 sentences.

sql: SELECT p.ProductName AS product, c.CategoryName AS category, SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS revenue FROM 'Order Details' od JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID JOIN Products p ON od.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN Categories as c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID GROUP BY product, category ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 3;
explanation: Generated by hybrid agent in ≤ 2 sentences.

sql: SELECT SUM(od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity * (1 - od.Discount)) AS total_revenue FROM 'Order Details' od JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Categories c ON p.CategoryID = c.CategoryID WHERE strftime('%m', o.OrderDate) BETWEEN '06' AND '08';
explanation: Generated by hybrid agent in ≤ 2 sentences.

sql: SELECT c.CompanyName, SUM((od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity) + ((1 - od.Discount / 100) * (od.UnitPrice * od.Quantity))) AS revenue FROM 'Order Details' od JOIN Orders o ON od.OrderID = o.OrderID JOIN Customers c ON o.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE strftime('%Y', o.OrderDate) = '1997' AND strftime('%m', o.OrderDate) >= '01' AND strftime('%m', o.OrderDate) <= '03' GROUP BY c.CompanyName ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 1;
